text: Can anyone think of a better article title than "A Computational Approach to Evolutionary Game Theory"? It's about comparing the analytic methods/solution concepts of EGT to an agent based model (using Agents.jl, amazing package btw) and seeing if we can get the same conclusions.

elements.text: Can anyone think of a better article title than "A Computational Approach to Evolutionary Game Theory"? It's about comparing the analytic methods/solution concepts of EGT to an agent based model (using Agents.jl, amazing package btw) and seeing if we can get the same conclusions.

text: And do you get the same conclusions? I think hinting to the final result of the paper in the title may help make the title more specific
